article: chinese public security authorities are awaiting a signal from taiwan to repatriate a suspect in a bank heist that occurred earlier this month in taiwan who had escaped to yunnan province but had been apprehended by the local police , a taiwan business source based in kunming said friday .
abstract: china said awaiting signal from taiwan to deport bank heist suspect
